name: df-bj-mo
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0
body: |- wb(wmoo(s0, w0), wal(s1, wex(s2, wal(s0, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))
comment: Definition of the uniqueness quantifier which is correct on the empty domain. Instead of the fresh variable ` z ` , one could save a dummy variable by using ` x ` or ` y ` at the cost of having nested quantifiers on the same variable. (Contributed by BJ, 12-Mar-2023.)
